metadata.title: Reinventing the Digital Soul
metadata.description: Why I chose ASCII art to represent my online identity.

content:
# Hello Presto

Here is some regular text using **Quicksand**.

## Code Block Example

```txt
import { clsx, type ClassValue } from "clsx";
import { twMerge } from "tailwind-merge";

export function cn(...inputs: ClassValue[]) {
  return twMerge(clsx(inputs));
}
```

## Table Example

| Syntax | Description |
| ----------- | ----------- |
| Header | Title |
| Paragraph | Text |

## Callout Example

<Callout type="default">
This is a default callout with some important information.
</Callout>

<Callout type="warning">
This is a warning callout. Be careful!
</Callout>
